message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $130?

I understand that you're on a budget, Bob, but I have to make a living from this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $140 for the product. Would you be willing to go up to $140?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product. Could we possibly reach an agreement around this amount?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I can offer you the product for $145, which is a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still believe we can find a middle ground. Would it be possible for us to agree on a price of $140 for the product?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get a bit more than $140. I can offer you the product for $147, which is still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to agree on a price of $145 for the product?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $150, Bob. I think this product is worth it to you, and I'm willing to meet you at the middle of our previous offers. I can offer you the product for $148, which is a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?

Thank you for your patience, Alice. I've considered your last offer, and I believe we can come to an agreement. I would like to propose a final price of $146 for the product. Is this within your range?
